message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still open to negotiating. I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $8800. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'd like to try to get an even better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $8500. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to get a better deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $9000. I'm willing to make a small concession, though. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $8900. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go above $8500. I'm willing to meet you at that price. Can you meet me at $8500?
